duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete a 6-month deep-dive training program with rotation across different KEB business units including manufacturing, engineering, and sales operations.
Participate in in-depth product training with hands-on exercises.
Engage in real-life applications and troubleshooting activities.
Receive training on KEB sales processes and tools from senior sales engineers.
Transition into the role of a KEB application engineer after the 6-month training program.
Pursue a career track in Sales Engineering or Senior Application Engineer after completion of the program.
